mdRecord.dcterms:title: Triangular bandage
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson & Johnson [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contained in cardboard box; label information: 1 triangular bandage; 40 in.; Manufactured by Johnson & Johnson, New Brunswick, N.J., Chicago, Ill.; Distributed only by Davis Emergency Equipment Co., Inc., New York; Pat. March 18, 1924; Unit No. 107; WWII era, possibly 8th evac donation.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bandages and bandaging
